name: 陳澤明
objective:
先修課程:負責教授同意
物質熱力學特性，改變能量形式之基本原理，熱力學第一及第二定律，可逆性與可用性，動力循環，冷凍循環，混合氣，化學反應。
schedule:
1	Basic Concepts of Thermodynamics
2	Basic Concepts of Thermodynamics
3	Properties of Pure Substances
4	Properties of Pure Substances
5	Properties of Pure Substances
6	The First Law of Thermodynamics: Closed systems
7	The First Law of Thermodynamics: Closed systems
8	The First Law of Thermodynamics: Control Volumes
9	期中考
10	The First Law of Thermodynamics: Control Volumes
11	The Second Law of Thermodynamics
12	The Second Law of Thermodynamics
13	Using Entropy
14	Using Entropy
15	Availability(Exergy) Analysis
16	Availability(Exergy) Analysis
17	Thermodynamic Relations
18	期末考
scorePolicy: 作業及平時考30%, 課堂表現10%, 期中考30%, 期末考30%
